SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.graphics.util

Class Position

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.math.vector.Vector2
civitas.celestis.graphics.util.Position
All Implemented Interfaces:
Vector, Serializable
public class Position extends Vector2
The position of an object on a two-dimensional plane. This is used to designate the coordinates of an object to render on-screen.
See Also:
